I'd just been ripped off while sending money from my UK bank to

out our banks. We then got together and started working on a new,
better system that could do this for everyone. In 2011, that system 
became TransferWise.

for: people who live multi-currency lives, or run multi-currency
businesses, who want to be smart with their money.

to build a cheaper, faster, fairer way of moving money.
